content.heading: <b> Tag
paragraphs: The <b> tag specifies bold text without extra importance.

Example:

This is normal text - this is bold text.

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: Use as a last resort; prefer <h1>-<h6> for headings, <em> for emphasis, <strong> for importance, <mark> for highlights.

content.heading: Examples
paragraphs:
CSS bold:

This is normal text - this is bold text.
